summary: Maximize Your Holdings: Earn Passive Income with Top Reflection Token on ERC-20 Chain with Smoked Token $BURN! - At Smoked Token Burn, they are committed to sustainability, community empowerment, fairness, and equality within their ecosystem. They have implemented an anti-whale mechanism to discourage disproportionately large transactions. The mechanism triggers a higher tax rate on transactions exceeding 1% of the total supply to promote fairness and inclusivity. It also aims to protect the community from market disruptions and ensure transparency and accountability in operations.
